mso-font-kerning:0pt">流式文件操作</span><span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></h2>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-left: 21pt; line-height: 18pt;"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;font-family:宋体;color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">这种方式的文件操作有一个重要的结构<span lang="EN-US">FILE</span>，<span lang="EN-US">FILE</span>在<span lang="EN-US">stdio.h</span>中定义如下：　　</span><b><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:#990000;
background:silver;mso-highlight:silver;mso-font-kerning:0pt">以下是引用片段：</span></b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;
background:silver;mso-highlight:silver;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><br>
typedef struct { <br>
</span><span style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;
background:silver;mso-highlight:silver;mso-font-kerning:0pt">　　<span lang="EN-US">int level; /* fill/empty level of buffer */ <br>
</span>　　<span lang="EN-US">unsigned flags; /* File status flags */ <br>
</span>　　<span lang="EN-US">char fd; /* File descriptor */ <br>
</span>　　<span lang="EN-US">unsigned char hold; /* Ungetc char if no buffer */ <br>
</span>　　<span lang="EN-US">int bsize; /* Buffer size */ <br>
</span>　　<span lang="EN-US">unsigned char _FAR *buffer; /* Data transfer buffer */ <br>
</span>　　<span lang="EN-US">unsigned char _FAR *curp; /* Current active pointer */ <br>
</span>　　<span lang="EN-US">unsigned istemp; /* Temporary file indicator */ <br>
</span>　　<span lang="EN-US">short token; /* Used for validity checking */ <br>
</span>　<span lang="EN-US">} FILE; /* This is the FILE object */</span></span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:11.5pt;font-family:宋体;color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:
0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="line-height: 18pt;"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;font-family:宋体;color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">　　<span lang="EN-US">FILE</span>这个结构包含了文件操作的基本属性，对文件的操作都要通过这个结构的指针来进行，此种文件操作常用的函数如下，下面是这些函数的功能使用说明：<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<h3 style="margin-left:70.9pt;text-indent:-1.0cm;mso-list:l4 level3 lfo1;

<o:p></o:p></span></h3>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="text-indent: 22.5pt; line-height: 18pt;"><b><span style="font-size:11.5pt;font-family:
宋体;color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">功能：打开流<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></b></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin: 0cm 0cm 7.8pt 21pt; text-indent: 21pt;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:11.5pt;font-family:宋体;color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">fopen</span><span style="font-size:11.5pt;font-family:宋体;color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">的原型是：<span lang="EN-US">FILE *fopen(const char *filename,const char *mode)</span>，<span lang="EN-US">fopen</span>实现三个功能：为使用而打开一个流，把一个文件和此流相连接，给此流返回一个<span lang="EN-US">FILR</span>指针。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin: 0cm 0cm 7.8pt 21pt; text-indent: 21pt;"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;
font-family:宋体;color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">参数<span lang="EN-US">filename</span>指向要打开的文件名，<span lang="EN-US">mode</span>表示打开状态的字符串，其取值如下：<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin: 0cm 0cm 7.8pt 63pt; text-indent: -21pt;"><!--[if !supportLists]--><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
11.5pt;font-family:Wingdings;mso-fareast-font-family:Wingdings;mso-bidi-font-family:

宋体;color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">以只读方式打开文件<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></b></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin: 0cm 0cm 7.8pt 63pt; text-indent: -21pt;"><!--[if !supportLists]--><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin: 0cm 0cm 7.8pt 21pt; text-indent: 21pt;"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;
font-family:宋体;color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">一个文件可以以文本模式或二进制模式打开，这两种的区别是：在文本模式中回车被当成一个字符<span lang="EN-US">'\n'</span>，而二进制模式认为它是两个字符<span lang="EN-US">0x0D,0x0A;</span>如果在文件中读到<span lang="EN-US">0x1B</span>，文本模式会认为这是文件结束符，也就是二进制模型不会对文件进行处理，而文本方式会按一定的方式对数据作相应的转换。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin: 0cm 0cm 7.8pt 21pt; text-indent: 21pt;"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;
font-family:宋体;color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">系统默认的是以文本模式打开，可以修改全部变量<span lang="EN-US">_fmode</span>的值来修改这个设置，例如<span lang="EN-US">_fmode=O_TEXT;</span>就设置默认打开方式为文本模式<span lang="EN-US">;</span>而<span lang="EN-US">_fmode=O_BINARY;</span>则设置默认打开方式是二进制模式。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin: 0cm 0cm 7.8pt 21pt; text-indent: 21pt;"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;
font-family:宋体;color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">我们也可以在模式字符串中指定打开的模式，如<span lang="EN-US">"rb"</span>表示以二进制模式打开只读文件，<span lang="EN-US">"w+t"</span>或<span lang="EN-US">"wt+"</span>表示以文本模式打开读<span lang="EN-US">/</span>写文件。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

font-family:宋体;color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">此函数返回一个<span lang="EN-US">FILE</span>指针，所以申明一个<span lang="EN-US">FILE</span>指针后不用初始化，而是用<span lang="EN-US">fopen()</span>来返回一个指针并与一个特定的文件相连，如果成败，返回<span lang="EN-US">NULL<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

font-family:宋体;color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">则执行<span lang="EN-US">str="Love
,I Have"</span>，读取了一行<span lang="EN-US">(</span>不包括行尾的<span lang="EN-US">'\n')</span>。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin: 0cm 0cm 7.8pt 21pt; text-indent: 21pt;"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;
font-family:宋体;color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">按格式输入到流，其原型是<span lang="EN-US">int fprintf(FILE *stream, const char *format[, argument, </span>…<span lang="EN-US">]);</span>其用法和<span lang="EN-US">printf()</span>相同，不过不是写到控制台，而是写到流罢了。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin: 0cm 0cm 7.8pt 21pt; text-indent: 21pt;"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;
font-family:宋体;color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">例：<span lang="EN-US">fprintf(fp,"%2d%s",4,"Hahaha");<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<h3 style="margin-left:70.9pt;text-indent:-1.0cm;mso-list:l4 level3 lfo1;

</span><span style="font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">从流中按格式读取</span><span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></h3>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin: 0cm 0cm 7.8pt 21pt; text-indent: 21pt;"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;
font-family:宋体;color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">从流中按格式读取，其原型是<span lang="EN-US">int fscanf(FILE *stream, const char *format[, address, </span>…<span lang="EN-US">]);</span>其用法和<span lang="EN-US">scanf()</span>相同，不过不是从控制台读取，而是从流读取罢了。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin: 0cm 0cm 7.8pt 21pt; text-indent: 21pt;"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;
font-family:宋体;color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">例：<span lang="EN-US">fscanf(fp,"%d%d"
,&x,&y);<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<h3 style="margin-left:70.9pt;text-indent:-1.0cm;mso-list:l4 level3 lfo1;

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin: 0cm 0cm 7.8pt 21pt; text-indent: 21pt;"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;
font-family:宋体;color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">例：<span lang="EN-US">if(feof(fp))printf("</span>已到文件尾<span lang="EN-US">");<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<h3 style="margin-left:70.9pt;text-indent:-1.0cm;mso-list:l4 level3 lfo1;

宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-font-kerning:0pt">发生错误时返回其值</span><span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></h3>

ferror(FILE *stream);</span>返回流最近的<span lang="EN-US"><a href="http://www.pcdog.com/special/1077/index.html" target="_blank"><span lang="ZH-CN" style="color:#333333;text-decoration:none;text-underline:none">错误代码</span></a></span>，可用<span lang="EN-US">clearerr()</span>来清除它，<span lang="EN-US">clearerr()</span>的原型是<span lang="EN-US">void clearerr(FILE *stream);<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin: 0cm 0cm 7.8pt 21pt; text-indent: 21pt;"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;
font-family:宋体;color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">例：<span lang="EN-US">printf("%d",ferror(fp));<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

mso-font-kerning:0pt">复位文件定位器到文件开始处</span><span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></h3>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin: 0cm 0cm 7.8pt 21pt; text-indent: 21pt;"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;
font-family:宋体;color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">例：<span lang="EN-US">rewind(fp);<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-font-kerning:0pt">从流中读指定个数的字符</span><span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></h3>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin: 0cm 0cm 7.8pt 21pt; text-indent: 21pt;"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;
font-family:宋体;color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">从流中读指定个数的字符，原型是<span lang="EN-US">size_t fread(void *ptr, size_t size, size_t n, FILE *stream);</span>参数<span lang="EN-US">ptr</span>是保存读取的数据，<span lang="EN-US">void*</span>的指针可用任何类型的指针来替换，如<span lang="EN-US">char*</span>、<span lang="EN-US">int *</span>等等来替换<span lang="EN-US">;size</span>是每块的字节数<span lang="EN-US">;n</span>是读取的块数，如果成功，返回实际读取的块数<span lang="EN-US">(</span>不是字节数<span lang="EN-US">)</span>，本函数一般用于二进制模式打开的文件中。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin: 0cm 0cm 7.8pt 21pt; text-indent: 21pt;"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin: 0cm 0cm 7.8pt 21pt; text-indent: 21pt;"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;

*tmpfile(void); </span>生成一个临时文件，以<span lang="EN-US">"w+b"</span>的模式打开，并返回这个临时流的指针，如果失败返回<span lang="EN-US">NULL</span>。在程序结束时，这个文件会被自动删除。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

font-family:宋体;color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">例：<span lang="EN-US">tmpnam(str1);<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin: 0cm 0cm 7.8pt 21pt; text-indent: 21pt;"><span lang="EN-US"> </span></p>

<h2 style="margin-left:49.6pt;text-indent:-1.0cm;mso-list:l4 level2 lfo1;
tab-stops:list 49.6pt"><!--[if !supportLists]--><span lang="EN-US">1.2<span style="font-weight: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal; font-family: 'Times New Roman';">   </span></span><!--[endif]--><span lang="EN-US">I/O</span><span style="font-family:
黑体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">文件操作</span><span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></h2>

<p style="text-indent:21.0pt;line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#333333">这是<span lang="EN-US">C</span>提供的另一种文件操作，它是通过直接存<span lang="EN-US">/</span>取文件来完成对文件的处理，而上篇所说流式文件操作是通过缓冲区来进行<span lang="EN-US">;</span>流式文件操作是围绕一个<span lang="EN-US">FILE</span>指针来进行，而此类文件操作是围绕一个文件的“句柄”来进行，什么是句柄呢<span lang="EN-US">?</span>它是一个整数，是系统用来标识一个文件<span lang="EN-US">(</span>在<span lang="EN-US">WINDOWS</span>中，句柄的概念扩展到所有设备资源的标识<span lang="EN-US">)</span>的唯一的记号。此类文件操作常用的函数如下表，这些函数及其所用的一些符号在<span lang="EN-US">io.h</span>和<span lang="EN-US">fcntl.h</span>中定义，在使用时要加入相应的头文件。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="text-indent:21.0pt;line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#333333">下面就对这些函数一一说明：<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<h3 style="margin-left:70.9pt;text-indent:-1.0cm;mso-list:l4 level3 lfo1;
tab-stops:list 96.55pt"><!--[if !supportLists]--><span lang="EN-US">1.2.1<span style="font-weight: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal; font-family: 'Times New Roman';">          
</span></span><!--[endif]--><span lang="EN-US">open()</span><span style="font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">打开一个文件并返回它的句柄</span><span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></h3>

<p style="margin-left:21.0pt;text-indent:21.0pt;line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#333333">打开一个文件并返回它的句柄，如果失败，将返回一个小于<span lang="EN-US">0</span>的值，原型是<span lang="EN-US">int open(const char *path, int<span class="apple-converted-space"> </span><a href="http://www.pcdog.com/special/1175/index.html" target="_blank"><span style="font-size:10.5pt;color:#0066CC">access</span></a><span class="apple-converted-space"> </span>[, unsigned mode]); </span>参数<span lang="EN-US">path</span>是要打开的文件名，<span lang="EN-US">access</span>是打开的模式，<span lang="EN-US">mode</span>是可选项。表示文件的属性，主要用于<span lang="EN-US">UNIX</span>系统中，在<span lang="EN-US">DOS/WINDOWS</span>这个参数没有意义。其中文件的打开模式如下表。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

char *oldname, const char *newname); </span>参数<span lang="EN-US">oldname</span>是旧文件名，<span lang="EN-US">newname</span>是新文件名。成功返回<span lang="EN-US">0<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="margin-top:7.8pt;margin-right:0cm;margin-bottom:0cm;margin-left:21.0pt;
margin-bottom:.0001pt;mso-para-margin-top:.5gd;mso-para-margin-right:0cm;
mso-para-margin-bottom:0cm;mso-para-margin-left:21.0pt;mso-para-margin-bottom:
.0001pt;text-indent:21.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">例：<span lang="EN-US">rename("c:\\config.sys","c:\\config.w40");<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<h3 style="margin-left:70.9pt;text-indent:-1.0cm;mso-list:l4 level3 lfo1;
tab-stops:list 96.55pt"><!--[if !supportLists]--><span lang="EN-US">1.2.9<span style="font-weight: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal; font-family: 'Times New Roman';">          
</span></span><!--[endif]--><span lang="EN-US">chsize();</span><span style="font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt">改变文件长度</span><span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></h3>

<p style="margin-top:7.8pt;margin-right:0cm;margin-bottom:0cm;margin-left:21.0pt;
margin-bottom:.0001pt;mso-para-margin-top:.5gd;mso-para-margin-right:0cm;
mso-para-margin-bottom:0cm;mso-para-margin-left:21.0pt;mso-para-margin-bottom:
.0001pt;text-indent:21.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">改变文件长度，原型是<span lang="EN-US">int chsize(int
handle, long size);</span>参数<span lang="EN-US">size</span>表示文件新的长度，成功返回<span lang="EN-US">0</span>，否则返回<span lang="EN-US">-1</span>，如果指定的长度小于文件长度，则文件被截短<span lang="EN-US">;</span>如果指定的长度大于文件长度，则在文件后面补<span lang="EN-US">'\0'</span>。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="margin-top:7.8pt;margin-right:0cm;margin-bottom:0cm;margin-left:21.0pt;
margin-bottom:.0001pt;mso-para-margin-top:.5gd;mso-para-margin-right:0cm;
mso-para-margin-bottom:0cm;mso-para-margin-left:21.0pt;mso-para-margin-bottom:
.0001pt;text-indent:21.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">例：<span lang="EN-US">chsize(handle,0x12345);<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="margin-top:7.8pt;margin-right:0cm;margin-bottom:0cm;margin-left:21.0pt;
margin-bottom:.0001pt;mso-para-margin-top:.5gd;mso-para-margin-right:0cm;
mso-para-margin-bottom:0cm;mso-para-margin-left:21.0pt;mso-para-margin-bottom:
.0001pt;text-indent:21.0pt"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:11.5pt;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#333333"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

<p style="text-indent:21.0pt;line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#333333">如果熟悉汇编可能会发现这种方式和汇编语言的<span lang="EN-US">DOS</span>功能调用句柄式文件操作很像，比如<span lang="EN-US">open()</span>就像<span lang="EN-US">DOS</span>服务的<span lang="EN-US">3CH</span>号功能调用，其实这种操作还有两种类型的函数就是直接用<span lang="EN-US">DOS</span>功能来完成的，如<span lang="EN-US">_open()</span>，<span lang="EN-US">_dos_open()</span>等等。有兴趣可自已查询<span lang="EN-US">BCB</span>的帮助。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="text-indent:21.0pt;line-height:18.0pt">同流式文件操作相同，这种也提供了<span lang="EN-US">Unicode</span>字符操作的函数，如<span lang="EN-US">_wopen()</span>等等，用于<span lang="EN-US">9X/NT</span>下的宽字符编程，有兴趣可自已查询<span lang="EN-US">BCB</span>的帮助。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="text-indent:21.0pt;line-height:18.0pt">另外，此种操作还有<span lang="EN-US">lock(),unlock(),locking()</span>等用于多用户操作的函数，但在<span lang="EN-US">BCB</span>中用得并不多，我就不介绍了，但如果要用<span lang="EN-US">C</span>来写<span lang="EN-US">CGI</span>，这些就必要的常识了，如果你有这方面的要求，那就得自已好好看帮助了。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="text-indent:21.0pt;line-height:18.0pt"><span lang="EN-US"> </span></p>

<h1 style="margin-left:21.25pt;text-indent:-21.25pt;mso-list:l4 level1 lfo1;
tab-stops:list 21.25pt"><!--[if !supportLists]--><span lang="EN-US">2<span style="font-weight: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal; font-family: 'Times New Roman';">    
</span></span><!--[endif]--><span lang="EN-US">C++</span><span style="font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"">文件操作</span><span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></h1>

<p style="text-indent:21.0pt;line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#333333">在<span lang="EN-US">C++</span>中，有一个<span lang="EN-US">stream</span>这个类，所有的<span lang="EN-US">I/O</span>都以这个“流”类为基础的，包括我们要认识的文件<span lang="EN-US">I/O</span>，<span lang="EN-US">stream</span>这个类有两个重要的运算符：<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="text-indent:21.0pt;line-height:18.0pt"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#333333">1</span><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#333333">、插入器<span lang="EN-US">(<<)<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="text-indent:21.0pt;line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#333333">向流输出数据。比如说系统有一个默认的标准输出流<span lang="EN-US">(cout)</span>，一般情况下就是指的显示器，所以，<span lang="EN-US">cout<<"Write
Stdout"<<'\n';</span>就表示把字符串<span lang="EN-US">"Write
Stdout"</span>和换行字符<span lang="EN-US">('\n')</span>输出到标准输出流。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="text-indent:21.0pt;line-height:18.0pt"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#333333">2</span><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#333333">、析取器<span lang="EN-US">(>>)<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="text-indent:21.0pt;line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#333333">从流中输入数据。比如说系统有一个默认的标准输入流<span lang="EN-US">(cin)</span>，一般情况下就是指的键盘，所以，<span lang="EN-US">cin>>x;</span>就表示从标准输入流中读取一个指定类型<span lang="EN-US">(</span>即变量<span lang="EN-US">x</span>的类型<span lang="EN-US">)</span>的数据。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="text-indent:21.0pt;line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#333333">在<span lang="EN-US">C++</span>中，对文件的操作是通过<span lang="EN-US">stream</span>的子类<span lang="EN-US">fstream(file stream)</span>来实现的，所以，要用这种方式操作文件，就必须加入头文件<span lang="EN-US">fstream.h</span>。下面就把此类的文件操作过程一一道来。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<h2 style="margin-left:49.6pt;text-indent:-1.0cm;mso-list:l4 level2 lfo1;
tab-stops:list 49.6pt"><!--[if !supportLists]--><span lang="EN-US">2.1<span style="font-weight: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal; font-family: 'Times New Roman';">   </span></span><!--[endif]--><span style="font-family:黑体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">打开文件</span><span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></h2>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　在<span lang="EN-US">fstream</span>类中，有一个成员函数<span lang="EN-US">open()</span>，就是用来打开文件的，其原型是：<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　<span lang="EN-US">void open(const char*
filename,int mode,int access);<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　参数：<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　<span lang="EN-US">filename</span>：　　要打开的文件名<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　<span lang="EN-US">mode</span>：　　　　要打开文件的方式<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　<span lang="EN-US">access</span>：　　　打开文件的属性<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　打开文件的方式在类<span lang="EN-US">ios(</span>是所有流式<span lang="EN-US">I/O</span>类的基类<span lang="EN-US">)</span>中定义，常用的值如下：<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="margin-left:113.0pt;mso-para-margin-left:2.0gd;text-indent:-92.0pt;
mso-char-indent-count:-8.0;line-height:18.0pt"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#333333">ios::app</span><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#333333">：　　　以追加的方式打开文件，指针始终指在文件尾基本针基本不可改变<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　<span lang="EN-US">ios::ate</span>：　　　文件打开后定位到文件尾，<span lang="EN-US">ios:app</span>就包含有此属性<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　<span lang="EN-US">ios::binary</span>： 　以二进制方式打开文件，缺省的方式是文本方式。两种方式的区别见前文<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　<span lang="EN-US">ios::in</span>：　　　 文件以输入方式打开<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="margin-left:115.0pt;text-indent:-115.0pt;mso-char-indent-count:-10.0;
line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#333333">　　<span lang="EN-US">ios::out</span>：　　　文件以输出方式打开，</span><span style="font-size:10.0pt;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:
Verdana;color:green">若文件已存在则清空原内容</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:10.0pt;
font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;color:green">(ofstream</span><span style="font-size:10.0pt;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:
Verdana;color:green">默认的打开方式</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:10.0pt;
font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;color:green">)<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin-left:114.7pt;line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:10.0pt;
mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;color:green">对于</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;color:green">ofstream</span><span style="font-size:10.0pt;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:
Verdana;color:green">吧，如果默认打开方式，它会把原文本给清空，可以加上</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;color:green">ios::in</span><span style="font-size:10.0pt;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:
Verdana;color:green">方式，安全打开，保留原文本内容</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
10.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;color:green"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin-top:0cm;margin-right:0cm;margin-bottom:0cm;margin-left:100.0pt;
margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-indent:-100.0pt;mso-char-indent-count:-10.0;
line-height:18.0pt"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
color:green">                          Eg</span><span style="font-size:10.0pt;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:
Verdana;color:green">：</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:10.0pt;
font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;color:green"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin-top:0cm;margin-right:0cm;margin-bottom:0cm;margin-left:100.0pt;
margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-indent:-100.0pt;mso-char-indent-count:-10.0;
line-height:18.0pt"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
color:green">                                Ofstream
ofile;<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin-top:0cm;margin-right:0cm;margin-bottom:0cm;margin-left:100.0pt;
margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-indent:-100.0pt;mso-char-indent-count:-10.0;
line-height:18.0pt"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;

font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;color:green"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="margin-top:0cm;margin-right:0cm;margin-bottom:0cm;margin-left:100.0pt;
margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-indent:-100.0pt;mso-char-indent-count:-10.0;

mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#333333"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　<span lang="EN-US">ios::nocreate</span>： 不建立文件，所以文件不存在时打开失败<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　<span lang="EN-US">ios::noreplace</span>：不覆盖文件，所以打开文件时如果文件存在失败<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　<span lang="EN-US">ios::trunc</span>：　　如果文件存在，把文件长度设为<span lang="EN-US">0<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　可以用“或”把以上属性连接起来，如<span lang="EN-US">ios::out|ios::binary<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　打开文件的属性取值是：<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　<span lang="EN-US">0</span>：普通文件，打开访问<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　<span lang="EN-US">1</span>：只读文件<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　<span lang="EN-US">2</span>：隐含文件<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　<span lang="EN-US">4</span>：系统文件<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　可以用“或”或者“<span lang="EN-US">+</span>”把以上属性连接起来
，如<span lang="EN-US">3</span>或<span lang="EN-US">1|2</span>就是以只读和隐含属性打开文件。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　例如：以二进制输入方式打开文件<span lang="EN-US">c:\config.sys<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　<span lang="EN-US">fstream file1;<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　<span lang="EN-US">file1.open("c:\\config.sys",ios::binary|ios::in,0);<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　如果<span lang="EN-US">open</span>函数只有文件名一个参数，则是以读<span lang="EN-US">/</span>写普通文件打开，即：<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　<span lang="EN-US">file1.open("c:\\config.sys");<=>file1.open("c:\\config.sys",ios::in|ios::out,0);<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　另外，<span lang="EN-US">fstream</span>还有和<span lang="EN-US">open()</span>一样的构造函数，对于上例，在定义的时侯就可以打开文件了：<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　<span lang="EN-US">fstream
file1("c:\\config.sys");<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　特别提出的是，<span lang="EN-US">fstream</span>有两个子类：<span lang="EN-US">ifstream(input file stream)</span>和<span lang="EN-US">ofstream(outpu
file stream)</span>，<span lang="EN-US">ifstream</span>默认以输入方式打开文件，而<span lang="EN-US">ofstream</span>默认以输出方式打开文件。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　<span lang="EN-US">ifstream
file2("c:\\pdos.def");//</span>以输入方式打开文件<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　<span lang="EN-US">ofstream
file3("c:\\x.123");//</span>以输出方式打开文件<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　所以，在实际应用中，根据需要的不同，选择不同的类来定义：如果想以输入方式打开，就用<span lang="EN-US">ifstream</span>来定义<span lang="EN-US">;</span>如果想以输出方式打开，就用<span lang="EN-US">ofstream</span>来定义<span lang="EN-US">;</span>如果想以输入<span lang="EN-US">/</span>输出方式来打开，就用<span lang="EN-US">fstream</span>来定义。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<h2 style="margin-left:49.6pt;text-indent:-1.0cm;mso-list:l4 level2 lfo1;
tab-stops:list 49.6pt"><!--[if !supportLists]--><span lang="EN-US">2.2<span style="font-weight: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal; font-family: 'Times New Roman';">   </span></span><!--[endif]--><span style="font-family:黑体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">关闭文件</span><span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></h2>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　打开的文件使用完成后一定要关闭，<span lang="EN-US">fstream</span>提供了成员函数<span lang="EN-US">close()</span>来完成此操作，如：<span lang="EN-US">file1.close();</span>就把<span lang="EN-US">file1</span>相连的文件关闭。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<h2 style="margin-left:49.6pt;text-indent:-1.0cm;mso-list:l4 level2 lfo1;
tab-stops:list 49.6pt"><!--[if !supportLists]--><span lang="EN-US">2.3<span style="font-weight: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal; font-family: 'Times New Roman';">   </span></span><!--[endif]--><span style="font-family:黑体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">读写文件</span><span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></h2>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="line-height: 18pt;"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;font-family:宋体;color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">　　读写文件分为文本文件和二进制文件的读取，对于文本文件的读取比较简单，用插入器和析取器就可以了<span lang="EN-US">;</span>而对于二进制的读取就要复杂些，下要就详细的介绍这两种方式<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<h3 style="margin-left:70.9pt;text-indent:-1.0cm;mso-list:l4 level3 lfo1;
tab-stops:list 96.55pt"><!--[if !supportLists]--><span lang="EN-US">2.3.1<span style="font-weight: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal; font-family: 'Times New Roman';">          
</span></span><!--[endif]--><span style="font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:
0pt">文本文件的读写</span><span lang="EN-US"> <o:p></o:p></span></h3>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="line-height: 18pt;"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;font-family:宋体;color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">　　文本文件的读写很简单：用插入器<span lang="EN-US">(<<)</span>向文件输出<span lang="EN-US">;</span>用析取器<span lang="EN-US">(>>)</span>从文件输入。假设<span lang="EN-US">file1</span>是以输入方式打开，<span lang="EN-US">file2</span>以输出打开。示例如下：<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="line-height: 18pt;"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;font-family:宋体;color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">　<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<div align="center">

11.5pt;font-family:宋体;color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="line-height: 18pt;"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;font-family:宋体;color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">　　操纵符
功能 输入<span lang="EN-US">/</span>输出</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="line-height: 18pt;"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;font-family:宋体;color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">　　<span lang="EN-US">dec </span>格式化为十进制数值数据 输入和输出<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="line-height: 18pt;"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;font-family:宋体;color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">　　<span lang="EN-US">endl </span>输出一个换行符并刷新此流 输出<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="line-height: 18pt;"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;font-family:宋体;color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">　　<span lang="EN-US">ends </span>输出一个空字符 输出<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="line-height: 18pt;"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;font-family:宋体;color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">　　<span lang="EN-US">hex </span>格式化为十六进制数值数据 输入和输出<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="line-height: 18pt;"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;font-family:宋体;color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">　　<span lang="EN-US">oct </span>格式化为八进制数值数据 输入和输出<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="line-height: 18pt;"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;font-family:宋体;color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">　　<span lang="EN-US">setpxecision(int p) </span>设置浮点数的精度位数 输出<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="line-height: 18pt;"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;font-family:宋体;color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">　　比如要把<span lang="EN-US">123</span>当作十六进制输出：<span lang="EN-US">file1<<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

0pt">二进制文件的读写</span><span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></h3>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="line-height: 18pt;"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;font-family:宋体;color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">　　①<span lang="EN-US">put()<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="line-height: 18pt;"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;font-family:宋体;color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">　　<span lang="EN-US">put()</span>函数向流写入一个字符，其原型是<span lang="EN-US">ofstream &put(char
ch)</span>，使用也比较简单，如<span lang="EN-US">file1.put('c');</span>就是向流写一个字符<span lang="EN-US">'c'</span>。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="line-height: 18pt;"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;font-family:宋体;color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">　　②<span lang="EN-US">get()<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="line-height: 18pt;"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;font-family:宋体;color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">　　<span lang="EN-US">get()</span>函数比较灵活，有<span lang="EN-US">3</span>种常用的重载形式：<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="line-height: 18pt;"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;font-family:宋体;color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">　　一种就是和<span lang="EN-US">put()</span>对应的形式：<span lang="EN-US">ifstream &get(char &ch);</span>功能是从流中读取一个字符，结果保存在引用<span lang="EN-US">ch</span>中，如果到文件尾，返回空字符。如<span lang="EN-US">file2.get(x);</span>表示从文件中读取一个字符，并把读取的字符保存在<span lang="EN-US">x</span>中。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="line-height: 18pt;"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;font-family:宋体;color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">　　另一种重载形式的原型是：<span lang="EN-US"> int get();</span>这种形式是从流中返回一个字符，如果到达文件尾，返回<span lang="EN-US">EOF</span>，如<span lang="EN-US">x=file2.get();</span>和上例功能是一样的。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="line-height: 18pt;"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;font-family:宋体;color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">　　还有一种形式的原型是：<span lang="EN-US">ifstream &get(char *buf,int num,char delim='\n');</span>这种形式把字符读入由<span lang="EN-US"> buf </span>指向的数组，直到读入了<span lang="EN-US"> num </span>个字符或遇到了由<span lang="EN-US"> delim </span>指定的字符，如果没使用<span lang="EN-US"> delim </span>这个参数，将使用缺省值换行符<span lang="EN-US">'\n'</span>。例如：<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="line-height: 18pt;"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;font-family:宋体;color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">　　<span lang="EN-US">file2.get(str1,127,'A');//</span>从文件中读取字符到字符串<span lang="EN-US">str1</span>，当遇到字符<span lang="EN-US">'A'</span>或读取了<span lang="EN-US">127</span>个字符时终止。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="line-height: 18pt;"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;font-family:宋体;color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">　　③读写数据块<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="line-height: 18pt;"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;font-family:宋体;color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">　　要读写二进制数据块，使用成员函数<span lang="EN-US">read()</span>和<span lang="EN-US">write()</span>成员函数，它们原型如下：<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="line-height: 18pt;"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;font-family:宋体;color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">　　<span lang="EN-US">read(unsigned char *buf,int num);<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="line-height: 18pt;"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;font-family:宋体;color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">　　<span lang="EN-US">write(const unsigned char *buf,int num);<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="line-height: 18pt;"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;font-family:宋体;color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">　　<span lang="EN-US">read()</span>从文件中读取<span lang="EN-US"> num </span>个字符到<span lang="EN-US"> buf </span>指向的缓存中，如果在还未读入<span lang="EN-US"> num </span>个字符时就到了文件尾，可以用成员函数<span lang="EN-US"> int gcount();</span>来取得实际读取的字符数<span lang="EN-US">;</span>而<span lang="EN-US"> write() </span>从<span lang="EN-US">buf </span>指向的缓存写<span lang="EN-US">
num </span>个字符到文件中，值得注意的是缓存的类型是<span lang="EN-US"> unsigned char *</span>，有时可能需要类型转换。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="line-height: 18pt;"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;font-family:宋体;color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">　　例：<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="line-height: 18pt;"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;font-family:宋体;color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">　　<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<h2 style="margin-left:49.6pt;text-indent:-1.0cm;mso-list:l4 level2 lfo1;

mso-font-kerning:0pt">检测</span><span lang="EN-US">EOF<o:p></o:p></span></h2>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="line-height: 18pt;"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;font-family:宋体;color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">　　成员函数<span lang="EN-US">eof()</span>用来检测是否到达文件尾，如果到达文件尾返回非<span lang="EN-US">0</span>值，否则返回<span lang="EN-US">0</span>。原型是<span lang="EN-US">int eof();</span></span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;
mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="line-height: 18pt;"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;font-family:宋体;color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">　　例：　　<span lang="EN-US">if(in.eof())ShowMessage("</span>已经到达文件尾<span lang="EN-US">!");<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<h2 style="margin-left:49.6pt;text-indent:-1.0cm;mso-list:l4 level2 lfo1;
tab-stops:list 49.6pt"><!--[if !supportLists]--><span lang="EN-US">2.5<span style="font-weight: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal; font-family: 'Times New Roman';">   </span></span><!--[endif]--><span style="font-family:黑体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">文件定位</span><span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></h2>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="line-height: 18pt;"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;font-family:宋体;color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">　　和<span lang="EN-US">C</span>的文件操作方式不同的是，<span lang="EN-US">C++ I/O</span>系统管理两个与一个文件相联系的指针。一个是读指针，它说明输入操作在文件中的位置<span lang="EN-US">;</span>另一个是写指针，它下次写操作的位置。每次执行输入或输出时，相应的指针自动变化。所以，<span lang="EN-US">C++</span>的文件定位分为读位置和写位置的定位，对应的成员函数是<span lang="EN-US"> seekg()</span>和<span lang="EN-US"> seekp()</span>，<span lang="EN-US">seekg()</span>是设置读位置，<span lang="EN-US">seekp</span>是设置写位置。它们最通用的形式如下：<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="line-height: 18pt;"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;font-family:宋体;color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">　　<span lang="EN-US">istream &seekg(streamoff offset,seek_dir origin);<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="line-height: 18pt;"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;font-family:宋体;color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">　　<span lang="EN-US">ostream &seekp(streamoff offset,seek_dir origin);<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="line-height: 18pt;"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;font-family:宋体;color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">　　<span lang="EN-US">streamoff</span>定义于<span lang="EN-US"> iostream.h </span>中，定义有偏移量<span lang="EN-US"> offset </span>所能取得的最大值，<span lang="EN-US">seek_dir </span>表示移动的基准位置，是一个有以下值的枚举：<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="line-height: 18pt;"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;font-family:宋体;color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">　　<span lang="EN-US">ios::beg</span>：　　文件开头<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="line-height: 18pt;"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;font-family:宋体;color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">　　<span lang="EN-US">ios::cur</span>：　　文件当前位置<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="line-height: 18pt;"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;font-family:宋体;color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">　　<span lang="EN-US">ios::end</span>：　　文件结尾<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="line-height: 18pt;"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;font-family:宋体;color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">　　这两个函数一般用于二进制文件，因为文本文件会因为系统对字符的解释而可能与预想的值不同。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="line-height: 18pt;"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;font-family:宋体;color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">　　例：<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="line-height: 18pt;"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;font-family:宋体;color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">　　<span lang="EN-US">file1.seekg(1234,ios::cur);//</span>把文件的读指针从当前位置向后移<span lang="EN-US">1234</span>个字节<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="line-height: 18pt;"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;font-family:宋体;color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">　　<span lang="EN-US">file2.seekp(1234,ios::beg);//</span>把文件的写指针从文件开头向后移<span lang="EN-US">1234</span>个字节<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="line-height: 18pt;"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;font-family:宋体;color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">在<span lang="EN-US">BCB</span>中也提供了文件操作的函数，这些函数的功能和前面所介绍的大致相同，但这类函数和<span lang="EN-US">BCB</span>关系紧密，能使用<span lang="EN-US">BCB</span>中的<span lang="EN-US">AnsiString</span>等数据类型，在<span lang="EN-US">BCB</span>中用这种方式的文件操作是最方便的，下面我就把这种文件操作详细介绍。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<h2 style="margin-left:49.6pt;text-indent:-1.0cm;mso-list:l4 level2 lfo1;

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="line-height: 18pt;"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;font-family:宋体;color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">文件名函数可以对文件的名称、所在子目录、驱动器和扩展名等进行操作。下表列出这些函数及其功能。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="line-height: 18pt;"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;font-family:宋体;color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">　　函数
说明<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="line-height: 18pt;"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;font-family:宋体;color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">　　<span lang="EN-US">ExpandFileName() </span>返回文件的全路径<span lang="EN-US">(</span>含驱动器、路径<span lang="EN-US">)<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="line-height: 18pt;"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;font-family:宋体;color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">　　<span lang="EN-US">ExtractFileExt() </span>从文件名中抽取扩展名<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="line-height: 18pt;"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;font-family:宋体;color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">　　<span lang="EN-US">ExtractFileName() </span>从文件名中抽取不含路径的文件名<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="line-height: 18pt;"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;font-family:宋体;color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">　　<span lang="EN-US">ExtractFilePath() </span>从文件名中抽取路径名<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="line-height: 18pt;"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;font-family:宋体;color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">　　<span lang="EN-US">ExtractFileDir() </span>从文件名中抽取目录名<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="line-height: 18pt;"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;font-family:宋体;color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">　　<span lang="EN-US">ExtractFileDrive() </span>从文件名中抽取驱动器名<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="line-height: 18pt;"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;font-family:宋体;color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">　　<span lang="EN-US">ChangeFileExt() </span>改变文件的扩展名<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="line-height: 18pt;"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;font-family:宋体;color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">　　<span lang="EN-US">ExpandUNCFileName() </span>返回含有网络驱动器的文件全路径<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="line-height: 18pt;"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;font-family:宋体;color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">　　<span lang="EN-US">ExtractRelativePath() </span>从文件名中抽取相对路径信息<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="line-height: 18pt;"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;font-family:宋体;color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">　　<span lang="EN-US">ExtractShortPathName() </span>把文件名转化为<span lang="EN-US"><a href="http://www.pcdog.com/special/1038/index.html" target="_blank"><span style="font-size:10.5pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;color:#0066CC;text-decoration:
none;text-underline:none">DOS</span></a></span>的<span lang="EN-US">8</span>·<span lang="EN-US">3</span>格式<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="line-height: 18pt;"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;font-family:宋体;color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">　　<span lang="EN-US">MatchesMask() </span>检查文件是否与指定的文件名格式匹配<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt;mso-outline-level:1"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　⑼<span lang="EN-US">ExtractRelativePath()<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　原型：<span lang="EN-US">extern PACKAGE
AnsiString __fastcall ExtractRelativePath(const AnsiString BaseName, const
AnsiString DestName);<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　功能：从文件名中抽取相对路径信息，如<span lang="EN-US">"..\sss\ss.asd"</span>这种形式<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　参数：<span lang="EN-US">BaseName</span>：基准文件名<span lang="EN-US">;DestName</span>：目标文件名<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　例：<span lang="EN-US">ShowMessage(ExtractRelativePath("D:\\Source\\c\\1.123","D:\\Source\\Asm\\dz.asm"));/*</span>显示<span lang="EN-US">"..\asm\dz.asm"*/<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt;mso-outline-level:1"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　⑽<span lang="EN-US">ExtractShortPathName()<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　原型：<span lang="EN-US">extern PACKAGE
AnsiString __fastcall ExtractShortPathName(const AnsiString FileName);<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　功能：把文件名转换为<span lang="EN-US"><a href="http://www.pcdog.com/special/1038/index.html" target="_blank"><span style="font-size:10.5pt;color:#0066CC">DOS</span></a></span>的<span lang="EN-US">8</span>、<span lang="EN-US">3</span>格式<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　参数：<span lang="EN-US">FileName:</span>要处理的文件名<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　例：<span lang="EN-US">ShowMessage(ExtractShortPathName("E:\\Program
Files\\Dual Wheel Mouse\\4dmain.exe"));/*</span>显示<span lang="EN-US">"E:\Progra~1\dualwh~1\4dmain.exe"*/<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt;mso-outline-level:1"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　⑾<span lang="EN-US">MatchesMask()<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　原型：<span lang="EN-US">extern PACKAGE bool
__fastcall MatchesMask(const AnsiString Filename, const AnsiString Mask);<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　功能：检查文件是否与指定的文件名格式匹配<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　参数：<span lang="EN-US">FileName:</span>要处理的文件名<span lang="EN-US">;Mask:</span>文件名格式，支持通配符<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　例：<span lang="EN-US">ShowMessage(MatchesMask("Lxf.exe","*.?x?));//</span>显示<span lang="EN-US">"true"<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:11.5pt;font-family:宋体;
color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:11.5pt;font-family:宋体;
color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>

<h2 style="margin-left:49.6pt;text-indent:-1.0cm;mso-list:l4 level2 lfo1;
tab-stops:list 49.6pt"><!--[if !supportLists]--><span lang="EN-US">3.2<span style="font-weight: normal; font-size: 7pt; line-height: normal; font-family: 'Times New Roman';">   </span></span><!--[endif]--><span style="font-family:黑体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">文件管理函数</span><span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></h2>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">这类函数包括设置和读取驱动器、子目录和文件的有关的各种操作，下表列出这类操作常用的函数及其功能。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　函数 功能<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　<span lang="EN-US">CreateDir() </span>创建新的子目录<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　<span lang="EN-US">DeleteFile() </span>删除文件<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　<span lang="EN-US">DirectoryExists() </span>判断目录是否存在<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　<span lang="EN-US">DiskFree() </span>获取磁盘剩余空间<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　<span lang="EN-US">DiskSize() </span>获取磁盘容量<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　<span lang="EN-US">FileExists() </span>判断文件是否存在<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　<span lang="EN-US">FileGetAttr() </span>获取文件属性<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　<span lang="EN-US">FileGetDate() </span>获取文件日期<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　<span lang="EN-US">GetCurrentDir() </span>获取当前目录<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　<span lang="EN-US">RemoveDir() </span>删除目录<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　<span lang="EN-US">SetCurrentDir() </span>设置当前目录<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">下面就把这些函数作一一介绍：<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt;mso-outline-level:1"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　⑴<span lang="EN-US">CreateDir()<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　原型：<span lang="EN-US">extern PACKAGE bool
__fastcall CreateDir(const System::AnsiString Dir);<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　功能：建立子目录，如果成功返回<span lang="EN-US">true</span>，否则返回<span lang="EN-US">false<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　参数：<span lang="EN-US">Dir:</span>要建立的子目录的名字<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　例：<span lang="EN-US">Create("ASM");//</span>在当前目录下建立一个名为<span lang="EN-US">ASM</span>的子目录<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt;mso-outline-level:1"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　⑵<span lang="EN-US">DeleteFile()<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　原型：<span lang="EN-US">extern PACKAGE bool
__fastcall DeleteFile(const System::AnsiString FileName);<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　功能：删除文件，如果成功返回<span lang="EN-US">true</span>，否则返回<span lang="EN-US">false<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　参数：<span lang="EN-US">FileName:</span>要删除的文件名<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　例：<span lang="EN-US">if(OpenDialog1->Execute())DeleteFile(OpenDialog1->FileName);<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt;mso-outline-level:1"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　⑶<span lang="EN-US">DirectoryExists()<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　原型：<span lang="EN-US">extern PACKAGE bool
__fastcall DirectoryExists(const System:: AnsiString Name);<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　功能：检测目录是否存在，如果存在返回<span lang="EN-US">true</span>，否则返回<span lang="EN-US">false<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　参数：<span lang="EN-US">Name:</span>要检测的目录名<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　例：<span lang="EN-US">if(!DirectoryExists("ASM"))CreateDir("ASM");//</span>如果<span lang="EN-US">ASM</span>这个目录不存在则创建之<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt;mso-outline-level:1"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　⑷<span lang="EN-US">DiskFree()<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　原型：<span lang="EN-US">extern PACKAGE __int64
__fastcall DiskFree(Byte Drive);<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　功能：检测磁盘剩余空间，返回值以字节为单位，如果指定的磁盘无效，返回<span lang="EN-US">-1<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　参数：<span lang="EN-US">Drive</span>：磁盘的代号，<span lang="EN-US">0</span>表示当前盘<span lang="EN-US">, 1=A,2=B,3=C </span>以此类推<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　例：<span lang="EN-US">ShowMessage(DiskFree(0));//</span>显示当前盘的剩余空间<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt;mso-outline-level:1"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　⑸<span lang="EN-US">DiskSize()<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　原型：<span lang="EN-US">extern PACKAGE __int64
__fastcall DiskSize(Byte Drive);<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　功能：检测磁盘容量，返回值以字节为单位，如果指定的磁盘无效，返回<span lang="EN-US">-1<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　参数：<span lang="EN-US">Drive</span>：磁盘的代号，<span lang="EN-US">0</span>表示当前盘<span lang="EN-US">, 1=A,2=B,3=C </span>以此类推<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　例：<span lang="EN-US">ShowMessage(DiskFree(0));//</span>显示当前盘的容量<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt;mso-outline-level:1"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　⑹<span lang="EN-US">FileExists()<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　原型：<span lang="EN-US">extern PACKAGE bool
__fastcall FileExists(const AnsiString FileName);<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　功能：检测文件是否存在，如果存在返回<span lang="EN-US">true</span>，否则返回<span lang="EN-US">false<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　参数：<span lang="EN-US">FileName:</span>要检测的文件名<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　例：<span lang="EN-US">if(FileExists("AAA.ASM"))DeleteFile("AAA.ASM");<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt;mso-outline-level:1"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　⑺<span lang="EN-US">FileGetAttr()<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　原型：<span lang="EN-US">extern PACKAGE int
__fastcall FileGetAttr(const AnsiString FileName);<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　功能：取得文件属性，如果出错返回<span lang="EN-US">-1<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　返回值如下表，如果返回<span lang="EN-US">$00000006</span>表示是一个具有隐含和系统属性的文件<span lang="EN-US">(4+2)<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　常量 值 含义<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　<span lang="EN-US">faReadOnly $00000001 </span>只读文件<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　<span lang="EN-US">faHidden $00000002 </span>隐含文件<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　<span lang="EN-US">faSysFile $00000004 </span>系统文件<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　<span lang="EN-US">faVolumeID $00000008 </span>卷标<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　<span lang="EN-US">faDirectory $00000010 </span>目录<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　<span lang="EN-US">faArchive $00000020 </span>归档文件<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　例：<span lang="EN-US">if(FileGetAttr("LLL.TXT")&0x2)ShowMessage("</span>这是一个有隐含属性的文件<span lang="EN-US">");<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　与此对应的有<span lang="EN-US">FileSetAttr() </span>，请自已查阅帮助系统<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt;mso-outline-level:1"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　⑻<span lang="EN-US">FileGetDate()<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　原型：<span lang="EN-US">extern PACKAGE int
__fastcall FileGetDate(int Handle);<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　功能：返回文件的建立时间到<span lang="EN-US">1970-1-1</span>日<span lang="EN-US">0</span>时的秒数<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　参数：<span lang="EN-US">Handle:</span>用<span lang="EN-US">FileOpen()</span>打开的文件句柄。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

mso-font-kerning:0pt">文件</span><span lang="EN-US">I/O</span><span style="font-family:黑体;mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">函数</span><span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></h2>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">这类函数完成对文件的读写相关的操作，这种类型的操作和<span lang="EN-US">C</span>的基于<span lang="EN-US">I/O</span>文件操作类似，下表列出这类操作常用的函数及其功能。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　<span lang="EN-US">FileOpen() </span>打开文件<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　<span lang="EN-US">FileClose() </span>关闭文件<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　<span lang="EN-US">FileRead() </span>读文件<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　<span lang="EN-US">FileSeek() </span>文件定位<span lang="EN-US">  <o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　<span lang="EN-US">FileWrite() </span>写文件<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　<span lang="EN-US">FileCreate() </span>创建文件<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　下面就对这些函数作详细介绍。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt;mso-outline-level:1"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　⑴<span lang="EN-US">FileOpen()<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　原型：<span lang="EN-US">extern PACKAGE int
__fastcall FileOpen(const AnsiString FileName, int Mode);<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　功能：打开文件，如果成功返回其句柄，否则返回<span lang="EN-US">-1<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　参数：<span lang="EN-US">FileName:</span>要打开的文件名<span lang="EN-US">;Mode</span>：打开的方式，取值如下表，可用<span lang="EN-US">"</span>或<span lang="EN-US">"("|")</span>运算符连接。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　常量 值 说明<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　<span lang="EN-US">fmOpenRead 0 </span>以只读属性打开<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　<span lang="EN-US">fmOpenWrite 1 </span>以只写属性打开<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　<span lang="EN-US">fmOpenReadWrite 2 </span>以读<span lang="EN-US">/</span>写属性打开<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　<span lang="EN-US">fmShareCompat 0 </span>兼容<span lang="EN-US">FCB</span>方式<span lang="EN-US">(</span>汇编中有相应的<span lang="EN-US"><a href="http://www.pcdog.com/special/1038/index.html" target="_blank"><span style="font-size:10.5pt;color:#0066CC">DOS</span></a></span>功能调用，感兴趣自已查阅相关资料<span lang="EN-US">)<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　<span lang="EN-US">fmShareExclusive 16 </span>共享方式：以独占方式打开，在关闭以前，别人不能访问<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　<span lang="EN-US">fmShareDenyWrite 32 </span>共享方式：拒绝写访问<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　<span lang="EN-US">fmShareDenyRead 48 </span>共享方式：拒绝读访问<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　<span lang="EN-US">fmShareDenyNone 64 </span>共享方式：无限制，允许读写<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　例：<span lang="EN-US">int
i=FileOpen("C:\\WINDOWS\\Win.ini",fmOpenReadWrite|fmShareExclusive);<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt;mso-outline-level:1"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　⑵<span lang="EN-US">FileClose()<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　原型：<span lang="EN-US">extern PACKAGE void
__fastcall FileClose(int Handle);<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　功能：关闭打开的句柄。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　参数：<span lang="EN-US">Handle:</span>要关闭的句柄<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　例：<span lang="EN-US">FileClose(i);<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt;mso-outline-level:1"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　⑶<span lang="EN-US">FileRead()<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　原型：<span lang="EN-US">extern PACKAGE int
__fastcall FileRead(int Handle, void *Buffer, int Count);<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　功能：读文件，返回实际读取的字节数，句柄必须首先由<span lang="EN-US">FileOpen</span>或<span lang="EN-US">FileCreate</span>创建。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　参数：<span lang="EN-US">Handle:</span>要读取的句柄<span lang="EN-US">;Buffer:</span>存放读取的数据的缓冲区<span lang="EN-US">;Count:</span>想读取的字节数<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　例：<span lang="EN-US">char
str[400];FileRead(hnd1,str,400);<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt;mso-outline-level:1"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　⑷<span lang="EN-US">FileSeek()<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　原型：<span lang="EN-US">extern PACKAGE int __fastcall
FileSeek(int Handle, int Offset, int Origin);<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　功能：移动文件读取指针，成功返回文件指针的位置，失败返回<span lang="EN-US">-1<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　参数：<span lang="EN-US">Handle:</span>相关联的句柄<span lang="EN-US">;Offset:</span>移动的量<span lang="EN-US">;Orgin:</span>移动的基准，<span lang="EN-US">0=</span>文件头，<span lang="EN-US">1=</span>当前位置，<span lang="EN-US">2=</span>文件尾。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　例：<span lang="EN-US">ShowMessage(FileSeek(hnd1,0,2));//</span>取得文件的长度<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt;mso-outline-level:1"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　⑸<span lang="EN-US">FileWrite()<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　原型：<span lang="EN-US">extern PACKAGE int
__fastcall FileWrite(int Handle, const void *Buffer, int Count);<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　功能：写文件，返回实际写入的字节数，句柄必须首先由<span lang="EN-US">FileOpen</span>或<span lang="EN-US">FileCreate</span>创建。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　参数：<span lang="EN-US">Handle:</span>要写入的句柄<span lang="EN-US">;Buffer:</span>存放写入数据的缓冲区<span lang="EN-US">;Count:</span>想写入的字节数<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　例：<span lang="EN-US">char str[]="I Love
You";FileWrite(hnd1,str,strlen(str));<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt;mso-outline-level:1"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　⑹<span lang="EN-US">FileCreate()<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:

__fastcall FileCreate(const AnsiString FileName);<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

"Times New Roman";color:#333333">　　功能：创建文件。成功返回其句柄，否则返回<span lang="EN-US">-1<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:

<p style="line-height:18.0pt"><span style="font-size:11.5pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
